Refunds

Thanks for buying supporting WICKEDTEMPLATES. If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, me Michael andreuzza is here to help.

If you’re not satisfied with the quality of the product you’ve purchased, please contact me and describe the refund reason. Once I receive your refund request, I will inspect it and notify you about our decision. Usually, I can’t make a refund because all our products are digital. But I are responsible for the quality of our products and provide a refund if you’re not satisfied with it.

The return right applies to all products presented on the wickedtemplates.com website except for Pro Access. You can stop your subscription any time, but we don’t refund money for purchasing Pro Access.
